Title: Increases the presumed "cost of the agent" relating to cigarette marketing standards and establishes the cigarette tax enforcement account; appropriation
Summary: Increases the presumed "cost of the agent" for purposes of cigarette marketing; establishes the cigarette tax enforcement fund; makes an appropriation from such account to support cigarette tax enforcement activities.
LawCode: Amd §§483, 472 & 482, Tax L; add §97-uuuu, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to increasing the presumed "cost of the agent" relating to cigarette marketing standards; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the cigarette tax enforcement account; and making an appropriation therefor
